CustomField.description: true if the country's value has no ISO3 code (ex: StoreDB system has no ISO3 code for some values : ISO3 code will be USA for HAWAII, GBR for England, MNP for SAIPAN, KOR for 'KOREA (DOM)'...)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: true if the country's value has no ISO3 code (ex: StoreDB system has no ISO3 code for some values : ISO3 code will be USA for HAWAII, GBR for England, MNP for SAIPAN, KOR for 'KOREA (DOM)'...)
CustomField.label: Has Other Value
